mapper.select: select ci.classcode,ci.class_name,cti.class_starttime,cti.class_endtime,cti.class_date from class_information as ci , class_time_information as cti where ci.classcode in (select cti0.class_information_classcode from class_time_information as cti0 where cti0.class_timecode in (select cr0.class_time_information_class_timecode from class_room as cr0 where cr0.member_usercode = #{usecode}));
mapper.insert: insert into member(usercode, address, address_detail, lat, lng, dong, usertype) values(#{usercode}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{dong}, #{usertype})
